thread.section_title: Holiday Inn New York City - Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean, modern hotel and nice staff
thread.title_full: Clean, modern hotel and nice staff - Review of Holiday Inn New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Givemechange
title: Clean, modern hotel and nice staff
text: Enjoyed our stay! Was expecting continental breakfast, none offered. There's a restaurant where we ate breakfast (mid-price range) on premises. A lot to do by the hotel, great location. Parking is $55 per day at a nearby parking garage (Icon) if you are driving. There's a PATH nearby that provides transportation everywhere. We took the E train from there straight to the 9/11 museum (not walkable). Very easy.
